alert.note: Alert for La Junta Vicinity, Otero County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued June 13 at 7:50AM MDT until June 15 at 7:12PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Pueblo CO has issued a Flood Watch for the following rivers in Colorado... Arkansas River At La Junta affecting La Junta Vicinity/Otero County zone. .Heavy rains will cause rises along the Arkansas river with flooding possible at La Junta. For the Lower Arkansas River...including La Junta...flooding is possible. ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY MORNING TO THURSDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding is possible. * WHERE...Arkansas River At La Junta. * WHEN...From Wednesday morning to Thursday evening. * IMPACTS...At 11.0 feet, Minor Flood. Minor agricultural flooding. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:15 AM MDT Tuesday the stage was 9.0 feet. - Forecast...Flood stage may be reached late tomorrow morning. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: If you are in the watch area, remain alert to possible flooding. Residents and those with interests near the river should monitor rising water levels and be prepared for possible flood warnings. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this afternoon at 400 PM MDT.
